feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
